languages.text: "Ответ положительный. Чтобы вывести "Герметико" из Процессии Проклятых, пришлось потревожить покой здешних убогих аборигенов".
"Response: affirmative. In order to move the Hermetico out of the Procession of the Damned, we had to disturb the pitiful locals."
languages.original_text: "Ответ положительный. Чтобы вывести "Герметико" из Процессии Проклятых, пришлось потревожить покой здешних убогих аборигенов".

traits.locale_text: "Response: affirmative. In order to move the Hermetico out of the Procession of the Damned, we had to disturb the peace of the pitiful locals."
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

traits.locale_text: "Response: affirmative. In order to move the Hermetico out of the Procession of the Damned, we had to disturb the peace of the pitiful locals."
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

traits.locale_text: "Response: affirmative. In order to move the Hermetico out of the Procession of the Damned, we had to disturb the pitiful locals."
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: 「応答：肯定する。呪われし道を抜け出してヘルメティコへ移動するために、卑しい地元民の気を逸らす必要があった」
languages.original_text: "Response: affirmative. In order to move the Hermetico out of the Procession of the Damned, we had to disturb the pitiful locals."

traits.locale_text: 「応答：肯定する。呪われし道を抜け出してヘルメティコへ移動するために、卑しい地元民の気を逸らす必要があった」
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: “回答为：肯定。为了把隐士之舟号开出‘亡者行军’，我们不得不打扰那些可怜的原住民。”
languages.original_text: "Response: affirmative. In order to move the Hermetico out of the Procession of the Damned, we had to disturb the pitiful locals."

traits.locale_text: “回答为：肯定。为了把隐士之舟号开出‘亡者行军’，我们不得不打扰那些可怜的原住民。”
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: « Réponse : affirmatif. Afin d'extraire l'Hermetico de la Procession des Damnés, nous avons dû quelque peu malmener la plèbe locale. »
languages.original_text: "Response: affirmative. In order to move the Hermetico out of the Procession of the Damned, we had to disturb the pitiful locals."

traits.locale_text: « Réponse : affirmatif. Afin d'extraire l'Hermetico de la Procession des Damnés, nous avons dû quelque peu malmener la plèbe locale. »
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: «Respuesta afirmativa. Al tener que sacar el Hermético de la Procesión de los Condenados, nos vimos obligados a perturbar a los lamentables lugareños».
languages.original_text: "Response: affirmative. In order to move the Hermetico out of the Procession of the Damned, we had to disturb the pitiful locals."

traits.locale_text: «Respuesta afirmativa. Al tener que sacar el Hermético de la Procesión de los Condenados, nos vimos obligados a perturbar a los lamentables lugareños».
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: "Reaktion: Bestätigung. Um die Hermetico aus der Prozession der Verdammten zu bewegen, mussten wir die erbärmlichen Einheimischen stören."
languages.original_text: "Response: affirmative. In order to move the Hermetico out of the Procession of the Damned, we had to disturb the pitiful locals."

traits.locale_text: "Reaktion: Bestätigung. Um die Hermetico aus der Prozession der Verdammten zu bewegen, mussten wir die erbärmlichen Einheimischen stören."
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: "Yanıt: Olumlu. Hermetico'yu Lanetliler Kafilesi'nden çıkarabilmek için zavallı bölge sakinlerine rahatsızlık vermemiz gerekti."
languages.original_text: "Response: affirmative. In order to move the Hermetico out of the Procession of the Damned, we had to disturb the pitiful locals."

traits.locale_text: "Yanıt: Olumlu. Hermetico'yu Lanetliler Kafilesi'nden çıkarabilmek için zavallı yerel halka rahatsızlık vermemiz gerekti."
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper
